devdoc.author: Daniel Beltrán
devdoc.details: This implements price feeds as our library

followModuleTransferHook(uint256,address.details: We don't need to execute any additional logic on transfers in this follow module.

params._index: is the index given to the follower when started flowmi following

returns._0: s_profileToFollowersCount[_profileid] % i_goal, total amount of followers related to the profile "modulo" the goal of the raffle, so it only counts whats haven't been raffled yet
s_profileToThisRaffleFunds[_profileid], amount gathered for this raffle
s_recentWinner address of the last winner
s_indexOfWinner index of the last winner

params.profileId: The token ID of the profile to query.

returns._0: ProfileData The ProfileData struct mapped to that profile.
s_profileToRaffles[_profileid], total amount of raffles delivered
s_profileToWins[_profileid], total amount of raffles won
s_profileToFunds[_profileid], total amount of funds related to the profile

params.data: The arbitrary data parameter, decoded into:      address currency: The currency address, must be internally whitelisted.      uint256 amount: The currency total amount to levy.      address recipient: The custom recipient address to direct earnings to.
params.profileId: The profile ID of the profile to initialize this module for.

returns._0: bytes An abi encoded bytes parameter, which is the same as the passed data parameter.

processFollow(address,uint256,bytes).details: Processes a follow by:  1. Charging a fee

devdoc.title: Flowmi contract

getBalance().notice: Gets the balance in the flowmi account

getFlowmiState().notice: Get a 1 if the contract is deployed

getFollowerOfIndex(address,uint256).notice: Gets the address of a follower by index of flowmi follow

getFollowsToRaffle(address).notice: Gets number of followers in the current raffle

getFundsInThisRaffle(address).notice: Gets funds in the current raffle

getGoal().notice: Retrieve the goal of followers when the raffle is activated

getNumberOfFollowers(address).notice: Gets the number of followers a profile has

getPool().notice: Let's you know how much is in aave protocol

getPriceFeed().notice: Gets the conversion in matic for 1 usd

getProfileData(uint256).notice: Returns the profile data for a given profile, or an empty struct if that profile was not initialized with this module.

getProfileToRaffles(address).notice: Gets total raffles a profile has made

getProfileToWins(address).notice: Gets total wins a profile has

getTotalFundedProfile(address).notice: Gets total funds a profile has been given

initializeFollowModule(uint256,bytes).notice: This follow module levies a fee on follows.

isFollowing(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Standard function to validate follow NFT ownership. This module is agnostic to follow NFT token IDs and other properties.

withdraw().notice: To witdraw the total amount of funds flowmi account has to the deployer

userdoc.notice: This contract is for raffling funds on flowmi, a pay-to-follow dapp
